item.description:
Cambridge SEO Group meets the first monday of each month.

Except this Month, we switch the date to allow those going to Ad Tech New York to attend on Nov 6th

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England to join us.

We also invite local Boston business owners to be our guest website to be reviewed.

This Month Guest Website to be Reviewed: (Please review prior to share your seo tips)

http://www.rentingyou...

RentingYourHome.com streamlines the tasks for landlords and saves valuable time at a fraction of the price of traditional property management. Spend time enjoying your property, not chasing down delinquent rent or dealing with tenant troubles!


Attending:

Jeff Takle
Founder
rentingyourhome.com


This Month's Guest Speaker:

Any Requests?

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!

Cambridge SEO MeetUp

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization November Meetup
